metadata.title: CVE-2015-2788 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in the ib_fill_isqlda function indbdimp.c in DBD-Firebird before 1.19 allow remote attackers to haveunspecified impact via unknown vectors that trigger an error condition,related to binding octets to columns.

criterions.comment: libdbd-firebird-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
